devices_included: TV; AR head mounted display (Hololens); Tablet
use_cases_desc: Mixed-reality TV, with content on AR tablet or AR head mounted display
contribution_desc: Using TV together with either AR Tablet or Hololens-like device, with additional content shown. Demo or poster submission.

crossdevice_def: "...the Multi-Device Mixed Reality TV set-up involves four devices: a TV set, a server (a set-top-box for instance), a tablet and a headset."
